chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p : packet) (d : Data) (u : unit) (o : list Output) (d' : Data) (l : list (Name * Msg)), NetHandler (pDst p) (pBody p) d = (u, o, d', l) -> d' + inc_in_flight_to_backup (send_packets (pDst p) l) = d + inc_in_flight_to_backup [p]

Premises:
NetHandler = fun (me : Name) (m : Msg) => match me with | primary => PrimaryNetHandler m | backup => BackupNetHandler m end : Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
Inductive Output : Prop := inc_executed : Output
inc_in_flight_to_backup = fun l : list packet => length (filterMap (fun p : packet => if msg_eq_dec (pBody p) inc then if name_eq_dec (pDst p) backup then Some tt else None else None) l) : list packet -> nat Arguments inc_in_flight_to_backup _%list_scope
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> msg Arguments pBody {P params}
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : name) (ps : list (name * msg)) => map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), name -> list (name * msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pDst {P params}
Inductive unit : Set := tt : unit
Data = nat : Set
Inductive Name : Set := primary : Name | backup : Name
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : name; pDst : name; pBody : msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive Msg : Set := inc : Msg | ack : Msg
InputHandler_inc_in_flight_to_backup_preserved : forall (h : Name) (i : Input) (d : Data) (u : unit) (o : list Output) (d' : Data) (l : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i d = (u, o, d', l) -> d' = d + inc_in_flight_to_backup (send_packets h l)
PrimaryNetHandler_no_msgs : forall (m : Msg) (d : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (d' : Data) (o : list Output) (u : unit), PrimaryNetHandler m d = (u, o, d', ms) -> ms = []
StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_dup net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_async net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_drop net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [ |- BaseParams] ?P : [ |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [ |- FailureParams ?P]
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_async_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) -> (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := xs ++ ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) -> (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := xs ++ ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
Inductive step_async (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_async net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_async {P params} Arguments StepAsync_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepAsync_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope
Inductive step_drop (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_drop net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_drop {P params} Arguments StepDrop_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_drop {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope
Inductive step_dup (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_dup net net' [] Arguments step_dup {P params} Arguments StepDup_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_dup {P params} _ [net' p] (_ _)%list_scope

step_ordered_dynamic_sind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> P o o0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [ |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [ |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [ |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_ind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (odnwNodes net)))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> P o o0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [ |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [ |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [ |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some d') |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [ |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [ |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [ |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (odnwPackets net) from to ms) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) to (Some d') |} ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [ |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [ |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [ |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]

StepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [ |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [ |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [ |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [ |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
Inductive step_ordered_dynamic (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (overlay_params : NameOverlayParams multi_params) (new_msg_params : NewMsgParams multi_params) : step_relation ordered_dynamic_network (name * (input + output)) := StepOrderedDynamic_start : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr Arguments step_ordered_dynamic {P multi_params overlay_params new_msg_params} Arguments StepOrderedDynamic_start {P multi_params overlay_params new_msg_params} _ [net' h] Arguments StepOrderedDynamic_deliver {P multi_params overlay_params new_msg_params} _ [net'] [tr]%list_scope [m] [ms out]%list_scope [d d'] [l]%list_scope _ [to] Arguments StepOrderedDynamic_input {P multi_params overlay_params new_msg_params} [h] _ [net'] [tr out]%list_scope [inp d d'] [l]%list_scope
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [ |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [ |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [ |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [ |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [ |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [ |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [ |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [ |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrdered_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (onwPackets net) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) h d |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered net net' tr
Inductive step_ordered_dynamic_failure (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (overlay_params : NameOverlayParams multi_params) (new_msg_params : NewMsgParams multi_params) (fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams multi_params) : step_relation (list name * ordered_dynamic_network) (name * (input + output)) := StepOrderedDynamicFailure_start : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed,...
Inductive step_ordered (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation ordered_network (name * (input + output)) := StepOrdered_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_ordered net net' tr Arguments step_ordered {P params} Arguments StepOrdered_deliver {P params} _ [net'] [tr]%list_scope [m] [ms out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope _ [to] Arguments StepOrdered_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [tr out]%list_scope [inp d] [l]%list_scope

```  
intros p d u o d' l H.
unfold NetHandler in H.
unfold inc_in_flight_to_backup.
unfold send_packets.
destruct p as [src [dst body]].
destruct dst eqn: Hdst.
- simpl in H. injection H as H1 H2 H3 H4. rewrite H1. auto.
- discriminate.
```
